original_text: That included the weight of gold for the lampstands and for their lamps. It also included the weight of silver for the silver lampstands and for their lamps. Each lampstand was different because they would use it for a different purpose.
korean_text: 또 금 등잔대들과 그 등잔 곧 각 등잔대와 그 등잔을 만들 금의 무게와 은 등잔대와 그 등잔을 만들 은의 무게를 각기 그 기구에 알맞게 하고

sentences.original_text: That included the weight of gold
for the lampstands and for their lamps
It also included the weight of silver
for the silver lampstands and for their lamps

sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 그것을 사용할 것이기 때문이다
